email_change_password_subject<>Change email password for Summoner Era

column2:
Thank you for playing Summoners Era. Hope you have amazing moments while enjoy playing it.

We would like to send you a small gift to support your upcoming adventure.

We hope you will be an important part of Summoners Era and make it even better in the future.

Thank you!
Summoners Era Team.

column2: \nThe Council would like to annouce that the server will go under maintenance on {1}. You will be unable to login during this time.\nPlease take note that the game will be unable to play during the maintenance time.
\nThe maitenance is completed. We would like to send you this gift as a thank for your patience during maintence time.\nKeep enjoying and conquering!
